name: Art of Chocolate Making
description: Explore the artistry and techniques of chocolate making.

lessons.name: Introduction to Chocolate Types
lessons.description: Learn about different types of chocolate.

lessons.name: Techniques in Truffle Making
lessons.description: Master the art of making delicious truffles.

lessons.name: Chocolate Sculpting
lessons.description: Explore the creative world of chocolate sculpting.

name: Pastry Mastery
description: Master the art of pastries, bread, and cake decorating.

lessons.name: Puff Pastry Perfection
lessons.description: Learn the secrets to perfect puff pastry.

lessons.name: Artisan Bread Baking
lessons.description: Master the art of baking artisan breads.

lessons.name: Advanced Cake Decorating Techniques
lessons.description: Take your cake decorating skills to the next level.

name: Confectionery Innovation
description: Innovate confectionery with molecular gastronomy and edible art.

lessons.name: Molecular Gastronomy in Confections
lessons.description: Explore innovative confectionery techniques.

lessons.name: Sugar Pulling and Blowing
lessons.description: Learn the delicate art of sugar pulling and blowing.

lessons.name: Creating Edible Art
lessons.description: Discover how to create edible masterpieces.

name: Medicinal Herb Gardens
description: Explore the world of medicinal herbs and learn how to cultivate your own herb garden.

lessons.name: Introduction to Medicinal Herbs
lessons.description: Get introduced to the diverse world of medicinal herbs.

lessons.name: Designing a Medicinal Herb Garden
lessons.description: Learn the art and science of designing a functional medicinal herb garden.

lessons.name: Cultivation and Harvesting Techniques
lessons.description: Master the techniques for cultivating and harvesting medicinal herbs.

name: Herbal Remedies
description: Discover the art of creating herbal remedies for various health benefits.

lessons.name: Making Herbal Tinctures and Infusions
lessons.description: Learn the process of making potent herbal tinctures and infusions.

lessons.name: Herbal Salves and Balms
lessons.description: Explore the creation of herbal salves and balms for skin health.

lessons.name: Herbal Teas for Health
lessons.description: Discover the health benefits of herbal teas and how to make them.

name: Herbology in Practice
description: Apply herbology in practical scenarios with case studies and integrative approaches.

lessons.name: Case Studies in Herbology
lessons.description: Explore real-life cases demonstrating the effectiveness of herbology.

lessons.name: Integrating Herbs into Daily Life
lessons.description: Learn how to seamlessly integrate herbs into daily life for health benefits.

lessons.name: Herb-Drug Interactions
lessons.description: Understand the interactions between herbs and conventional medications.

name: Hindi Basics
description: Build a strong foundation in Hindi language basics, including the alphabet, vocabulary, and pronunciation.

lessons.name: Introduction to Hindi Alphabet
lessons.description: Get started with the fundamentals of the Hindi alphabet.

lessons.name: Basic Vocabulary and Phrases
lessons.description: Learn essential Hindi vocabulary and common phrases.

lessons.name: Hindi Pronunciation
lessons.description: Master the pronunciation of Hindi sounds and words.

name: Conversational Hindi
description: Enhance your Hindi language skills with everyday conversations, greetings, and common phrases.

lessons.name: Everyday Conversations
lessons.description: Engage in day-to-day conversations using Hindi.

lessons.name: Greetings and Polite Expressions
lessons.description: Learn how to greet and express politeness in Hindi.

lessons.name: Asking for Directions and Common Phrases
lessons.description: Navigate through Hindi-speaking regions with ease and use common phrases.

name: Cultural Insights
description: Explore the rich cultural aspects of Hindi-speaking communities, including festivals, traditions, and cuisine.

lessons.name: Understanding Hindi Culture
lessons.description: Gain insights into the cultural nuances of Hindi-speaking communities.

lessons.name: Festivals and Celebrations
lessons.description: Discover the vibrant festivals and celebrations in Hindi culture.

lessons.name: Traditional Hindi Cuisine
lessons.description: Explore the flavors and dishes of traditional Hindi cuisine.

name: Understanding Male Friendships
description: Delve into the dynamics, history, and psychological aspects of male friendships.

lessons.name: Dynamics of Bromances
lessons.description: Understand the unique dynamics of close male friendships.

lessons.name: Historical Perspectives
lessons.description: Explore historical perspectives on male friendships.

lessons.name: Psychological Aspects
lessons.description: Examine the psychological aspects of male friendships.

name: Traffic Rules and Regulations
description: Learn the rules and regulations governing traffic, including road signs, right of way, and safe driving practices.

lessons.name: Understanding Road Signs
lessons.description: Decode the meanings of various road signs and symbols.

lessons.name: Right of Way and Traffic Signals
lessons.description: Understand the principles of right of way and the function of traffic signals.

lessons.name: Speed Limits and Safe Driving Practices
lessons.description: Explore the importance of adhering to speed limits and adopting safe driving practices.

name: Defensive Driving Techniques
description: Master defensive driving techniques, including hazard anticipation, proper following distances, and handling adverse weather conditions.

lessons.name: Anticipating and Avoiding Hazards
lessons.description: Develop skills to anticipate and avoid potential driving hazards.

lessons.name: Proper Following Distances
lessons.description: Learn about maintaining proper following distances for enhanced safety.

lessons.name: Handling Adverse Weather Conditions
lessons.description: Navigate challenging weather conditions with confidence and caution.

name: Vehicle Maintenance
description: Understand the basics of vehicle maintenance, covering topics like basic car care, tire inspection, and fluid checks.

lessons.name: Basic Car Maintenance Tips
lessons.description: Get insights into essential tips for maintaining your car in good condition.

lessons.name: Tire Care and Inspection
lessons.description: Learn the importance of proper tire care and regular inspections.

lessons.name: Checking Fluids and Lights
lessons.description: Explore the key aspects of checking fluids and lights for vehicle safety.

name: Geology of the Himalayas
description: Uncover the geological wonders of the Himalayas, including their formation, tectonic activity, and rock types.

lessons.name: Formation and Tectonic Activity
lessons.description: Learn about the geological processes that led to the formation of the Himalayas.

lessons.name: Types of Rocks in the Himalayas
lessons.description: Explore the different types of rocks found in the Himalayan region.

lessons.name: Glacial Processes
lessons.description: Understand the role of glacial processes in shaping the Himalayan landscape.

name: Biodiversity in the Himalayan Region
description: Study the rich biodiversity of the Himalayan region, addressing flora and fauna diversity, conservation challenges, and rare species.

lessons.name: Flora and Fauna Diversity
lessons.description: Explore the diverse flora and fauna that thrive in the Himalayan ecosystem.

lessons.name: Conservation Challenges
lessons.description: Understand the challenges associated with conserving the unique biodiversity of the Himalayas.

lessons.name: Rare and Endangered Species
lessons.description: Learn about the rare and endangered species that inhabit the Himalayan region.

name: Cultural Significance
description: Delve into the cultural aspects of the Himalayan region, exploring spiritual practices, traditional architecture, and the impact of tourism on local communities.

lessons.name: Spiritual Practices and Himalayan Culture
lessons.description: Gain insights into the spiritual practices and cultural heritage of the Himalayan communities.

lessons.name: Traditional Architecture
lessons.description: Explore the unique architectural styles and structures prevalent in the Himalayan region.

lessons.name: Impact of Tourism on Himalayan Communities
lessons.description: Understand the effects of tourism on the social and cultural fabric of Himalayan communities.

name: Introduction to Exterior Design
description: Explore the fundamental principles of exterior design, emphasizing the balance between form and function.

lessons.name: Principles of Exterior Design
lessons.description: Understand the foundational principles that govern effective exterior design.

lessons.name: Balancing Form and Function
lessons.description: Learn the art of balancing aesthetic appeal with functional design in exterior spaces.

lessons.name: Outdoor Spaces and Landscaping
lessons.description: Explore the design considerations for creating inviting outdoor spaces and landscaping.

name: Materials and Finishes
description: Dive into the selection of materials and finishes for exterior design, including sustainable practices and coatings.

lessons.name: Choosing Exterior Materials
lessons.description: Gain insights into selecting appropriate materials for exterior construction and design.

lessons.name: Sustainable Design Practices
lessons.description: Explore sustainable practices in exterior design to minimize environmental impact.

lessons.name: Exterior Finishes and Coatings
lessons.description: Understand the role of finishes and coatings in enhancing the durability and aesthetics of exteriors.

name: Trends in Exterior Decorating
description: Stay updated on the latest trends in exterior decorating, from modern and traditional styles to incorporating technology.

lessons.name: Modern vs. Traditional Styles
lessons.description: Compare and contrast modern and traditional styles in exterior decorating.

lessons.name: Incorporating Technology
lessons.description: Explore the integration of technology for enhanced functionality and aesthetics in exterior design.

lessons.name: Seasonal Decorating Tips
lessons.description: Discover seasonal tips and trends for decorating exteriors throughout the year.

name: Introduction to Women's Studies
description: Gain historical perspectives and explore key concepts in the field of women's studies.

lessons.name: Historical Perspectives
lessons.description: Examine historical events and movements that have shaped women's studies.

lessons.name: Feminist Movements
lessons.description: Explore the diverse feminist movements and their contributions to gender equality.

lessons.name: Key Concepts in Women's Studies
lessons.description: Understand fundamental concepts that form the basis of women's studies as an academic discipline.

name: Feline Behavior
description: Explore the intricacies of feline behavior, including communication, body language, and social structures.

lessons.name: Understanding Cat Communication
lessons.description: Learn to decipher the communication methods used by cats to express their needs and emotions.

lessons.name: Cat Body Language
lessons.description: Examine the subtle cues in a cat's body language and how it reflects their mood and intentions.

lessons.name: Social Structure in Cats
lessons.description: Understand the social dynamics and hierarchy within a group of cats.

name: Health and Nutrition
description: Delve into the aspects of feline health, nutrition, and preventive care to ensure the well-being of your cat.

lessons.name: Feeding Your Cat a Balanced Diet
lessons.description: Discover the principles of providing a well-balanced and nutritious diet for your feline companion.

lessons.name: Common Health Issues
lessons.description: Identify and understand common health issues that may affect cats and how to address them.

lessons.name: Preventive Care and Vaccinations
lessons.description: Learn about preventive measures and vaccinations to maintain your cat's health and longevity.

name: Cat Breeds and Genetics
description: Explore the diversity of cat breeds, their genetic traits, and how to choose the perfect feline companion.

lessons.name: Different Cat Breeds
lessons.description: Discover various cat breeds, each with its unique characteristics and traits.

lessons.name: Genetics and Coat Patterns
lessons.description: Understand the genetics behind cat coat patterns and colors.

lessons.name: Selecting the Right Cat for You
lessons.description: Guidance on choosing the most suitable cat breed based on your lifestyle and preferences.

name: Basics of Canine Behavior
description: Gain insights into canine behavior, focusing on communication, socialization, and common behavioral issues.

lessons.name: Communication and Socialization
lessons.description: Understand how dogs communicate and the importance of socialization for their well-being.

lessons.name: Understanding Dog Body Language
lessons.description: Learn to interpret the body language of dogs to enhance your understanding of their emotions.

lessons.name: Common Behavioral Issues
lessons.description: Explore and address common behavioral issues that may arise in dogs.

name: Canine Health and Care
description: Cover the essentials of canine health, including nutrition, exercise, grooming, and veterinary care.

lessons.name: Nutrition and Exercise
lessons.description: Learn about proper nutrition and exercise routines for maintaining a healthy and happy dog.

lessons.name: Grooming and Hygiene
lessons.description: Explore grooming techniques and hygiene practices to keep your dog clean and comfortable.

lessons.name: Veterinary Care and Preventive Measures
lessons.description: Understand the importance of regular veterinary care and preventive measures for your dog's well-being.

name: Dog Breeds and Training
description: Discover the diversity of dog breeds and effective training techniques, including agility and specialty training.

lessons.name: Recognizing Different Dog Breeds
lessons.description: Learn to identify and appreciate the unique characteristics of various dog breeds.

lessons.name: Basic Training Techniques
lessons.description: Explore fundamental training techniques to foster a well-behaved and obedient dog.

lessons.name: Agility and Specialty Training
lessons.description: Discover advanced training methods, including agility and specialty training, to engage and challenge your dog.

name: Political Landscape of West Bengal
description: Examine the historical context, key political figures, and major movements shaping the political landscape of West Bengal.

lessons.name: Historical Overview
lessons.description: Explore the historical events that have shaped the political landscape of West Bengal.

lessons.name: Key Political Figures
lessons.description: Learn about influential political figures who played a crucial role in West Bengal's politics.

lessons.name: Major Political Movements
lessons.description: Examine significant political movements that have left a lasting impact on West Bengal.

name: Mamata Banerjee's Leadership
description: Study the rise to power, governance style, policies, challenges, and achievements of Mamata Banerjee's leadership in West Bengal.

lessons.name: Rise to Power
lessons.description: Trace Mamata Banerjee's journey to political prominence and leadership in West Bengal.

lessons.name: Governance Style and Policies
lessons.description: Explore Mamata Banerjee's approach to governance and the policies implemented during her tenure.

lessons.name: Challenges and Achievements
lessons.description: Examine the challenges faced and achievements accomplished under Mamata Banerjee's leadership.

name: Political Influence Beyond West Bengal
description: Analyze the national and international impact, future prospects, and legacy of political strategies beyond the borders of West Bengal.

lessons.name: National and International Impact
lessons.description: Evaluate the influence of West Bengal's political landscape on the national and international stage.

lessons.name: Future Prospects and Legacy
lessons.description: Speculate on the future trajectory and lasting legacy of political strategies originating from West Bengal.

lessons.name: Analyzing Political Strategies
lessons.description: Delve into the analysis of political strategies employed in West Bengal and their broader implications.

name: The Beatles and Transcendental Meditation
description: Explore the intersection of The Beatles and Transcendental Meditation, including their introduction, influence on music, and spiritual journey.

lessons.name: Introduction to TM and The Beatles
lessons.description: Discover the connection between Transcendental Meditation and The Beatles, and their initial introduction to TM.

lessons.name: Influence on Music and Creativity
lessons.description: Examine the impact of Transcendental Meditation on The Beatles' music and creative process.

lessons.name: Spiritual Journey through Music
lessons.description: Explore the spiritual journey undertaken by The Beatles through their music and involvement with Transcendental Meditation.

name: Impact on Popular Culture
description: Investigate the influence of The Beatles and Transcendental Meditation on popular culture, including the 1960s counterculture and their legacy in modern music.

lessons.name: TM's Influence on the 1960s Counterculture
lessons.description: Examine the role of Transcendental Meditation in shaping the counterculture of the 1960s.

lessons.name: Beatles' Contribution to Psychedelic Movement
lessons.description: Explore The Beatles' contribution to the psychedelic movement and countercultural shifts.

lessons.name: Legacy in Modern Music and Meditation
lessons.description: Trace the lasting legacy of The Beatles and Transcendental Meditation in contemporary music and meditation practices.
